nodes.bodyText: Could you please move this export code to a new function? This is now a really long method and would be easier to read if split in two.
Please use string resources, so the text can be translated.
Calling create is not needed if you show it afterwards. You can just delete this line.
For a button action that just closes the dialog, you can also pass null as the second argument
